name: Xquisite
description:
Im new to the world of developers, and figured it would be a good idea to start small. My first project is entirely written in python using the pygame module. For ease it is converted to a .exe via pyinstaller. 

Xquisite is inspired by Cookie Clicker, though albeit at a much smaller scale (about 5-10 minutes gameplay) as well as being bound to the gameJam theme "Endangered" by creatus (https://itch.io/jam/creatus-jam-2)

If you are able to run it without any interference by your anti-virus program, please do let me know your first impression.

Incomplete Features:

- Proper "game over" screen

- Options (game will forcefully run at 60fps as well as low volume)

- Certificate to ensure .exe doesn't get flagged falsely by anti-virus programs

- Additional type of events that influence the game

- Customizable background (for the blue haters)

- Achievements (just to add a lil spice and banter)

- Demo amount of animals (more planned)

- Good art (Every "art" asset you see was drawn by me, and it is very obvious what my level of art skill  is)

- Proper credits (it is mentioned all audio sources come from Pixabay, but despite not needing to give credit I would like to specify the authors regardless)

- Potential bugs due to incomplete Testing
